arts.ttl: Liverpool ace reveals he was set for Leeds United transfer until a surprise intervention
arts.sum: Liverpool star Cody Gakpo has spoken for the first time about just how close he came to joining Leeds United, with a dubious goals panel seemingly the difference in denying the Whites the Dutchman's talents. If I score two times, I’ll go to Leeds.

arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Leeds United as 'colossus' earns 8/10 but two 5/10s dished out - gallery
arts.sum: It’s fair to say defences came out on top as promotion rivals Burnley and Leeds United played out an instantly forgettable goalless draw last night.
Burnley's goalless draw against Leeds was dubbed as being not "the most sexiest game" by Daniel Farke but Scott Parker believes his team are "remarkable".

arts.ttl: Burnley and Leeds share Championship snooze fest to expose growing Premier League chasm
arts.sum: BURNLEY 0-0 LEEDS UNITED: This was billed as a summit meeting as Championship leaders Leeds faced third-placed Burnley at Turf Moor, but instead it turned into a snooze fest

arts.ttl: Scott Parker's immediate reaction to Burnley's goalless draw with Leeds United
arts.sum: Scott Parker admits he was happy to settle for a point in Burnley’s top-of-the-table clash against Leeds United.

arts.ttl: Promotion rivals Burnley and Leeds take cold comfort in tense draw
arts.sum: For generations to come in Lancashire and Yorkshire thousands will tell people “I was there” to see the match where the least action in the history of football took place. Burnley and Leeds are supposed to be fighting for promotion but they produced a solitary shot on target between them in a desperate goalless draw. Third-placed Burnley collected their seventh Championship clean sheet in a row –and 20th overall – while Leeds moved a further point clear at the top of the table. Arguably the result suited both parties but was arduous viewing on an extremely cold night at Turf Moor. Leeds will almost certainly go up and this will be a footnote, whereas Burnley need to provide greater intent after a ninth goalless draw of the season. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Leeds United player ratings vs Burnley as Joe Rodon brilliant but attackers frustrated - Isaac Johnson
arts.sum: Joe Rodon had an excellent game, cutting out balls and playing forward whenever possible. In a close affair, United struggled to find any clear cut chances until Daniel Jame's late effort forced a save from James Trafford.

arts.ttl: Burnley's record-breaking rearguard denies leaders Leeds
arts.sum: Burnley took their run without conceding a goal to more than 10 hours as they held Championship leaders Leeds to a goalless draw at Turf Moor.

arts.ttl: Promotion hopefuls Burnley and Leeds play out drab draw
Burnley 0-0 Leeds United: Both sides happy to take the point in lifeless top-of-the-table clash
arts.sum: Promotion rivals Burnley and Leeds United played out a dull and lifeless goalless draw in a top-of-the-table clash that neither side wanted to lose.
